using.from sentence: In terms of prediction quality , the results show that 1 ) the unselected head tokens do contribute to the prediction , bringing 0.2 % improvement ; 2 ) using separate RSS modules to select the head and dependent tokens improves accuracy by 0.5 % ; and 3 ) hard attention and soft self - attention modules improve the accuracy by 0.3 % and 2.9 % respectively .
